title: What are the unforgettable experiences you had in your life? - Quora

response.answer_text: One: I’m male, 6 foot, above average build, good looking, in my early 20’s, I managed a 7–11 in Salt Lake City, UT. Think “Fatal Attraction” is scary, ha! Sandy married an old boyfriend in her last attempt to return to her. I miss and think of her often, however NEVER again. This is an experience I will never forget. My friends and I decided that we would go on a mini holiday for three days to a sea based town. It was roughly a six hour bus ride down there from where I was currently staying. However we had to get another bus to get to the station for where it would it depart which would take about an hour. We booked a hotel and had to catch a bus at around 6:30 am, meaning we had to wake up around 5:00 am. The night before my friend and I had some grilled chicken that wasn’t so fresh but was edible. I woke up in the morning getting ready to leave my stomach felt a little strange but I thought nothing of it and proceed to get ready to catch this bus that would take us to to other bus we had to catch. we were already running late and didn’t want to miss the bus we needed to take. At this point my stomach was feeling really bad like I need to use the bathroom for a number two. But I didn’t have time because my friends and I were rushing and we had no time for bathroom breaks. So we finally get onto this bus and we’re about 15 minutes into the journey. My stomach is cramping like crazy and I really needed the bathroom and I was clenching my butt cheeks like there was no tomorrow for if even a second i stopped clenching I would worry I’d let the gates of hell out of my arse. So I turned to my friend and said, ‘ bro I need to go to the toilet now! Otherwise I’m going to shit myself’ he laughed and looked at me and said, ‘ seriously’ I said ‘yes seriously. I asked him if he could ask the bus driver to stop at the nearest petrol station so I could use the bathroom. I couldn’t do it myself because I feared I would crap myself if I even stood up for a minute. So my friend went up I could see him having a conversation with the driver and he promptly came back and said, ‘ the guy agreed to stop at the next available petrol station’. I was relieved. Sure enough about 10 minutes later we came to a stop and I couldn’t get out of that bus fast enough I charge into the shop and practically yell at the cashier, ‘where’s the bathroom?’ He points me in the right direction and I’m met with three different bathrooms, women, men and disabled. I decide to use the disabled because it would be more comfortable and roomy. So I run in there and the pure relief I felt and letting all my insides just fall out of me. At this point my friend is calling my phone like crazy telling me the driver is getting pissed off because I’m taking so long even though it had only been five minutes. So as I’m done I look for toilet paper and the nightmare continues there is no toilet paper. Now you can imagine after a monumentous shit the toilet paper is essential. I didn’t know what to do. So I slightly opened the door to the toilet to see if anyone was there because I was gonna run into the male toilets. No one was and I promptly left, with my trousers barely covering my bare arse. At this point a women comes out of nowhere and I’m like ‘oh shit’ I quickly bolt into the male toilets scaring her half to death, clean myself up and run back to the coach half pulling up my trousers. As I get back onto the bus all the travellers are laughing and I’m sure everyone here can guess why. Anyway I get back to my seat and we start moving again. My friends are all making fun of me at this point, laughing and making jokes. I just brush it off and try to listen to music. About an hour into the journey my friend, who is sitting next to me, taps me on the shoulder and says, ‘I need to go’ I was like karma is a bitch isn’t it. He tells me he needs to go now otherwise he will shit himself as well. ( he was also the friend who ate the dodgy food with me last night) He goes up to the bus driver asks him to make a stop. He comes back and says, ‘the bus driver won’t stop until we get to the next allotted break’. I asked ‘ how long until the break?’ He replied ‘ one hour’. My friend at this point is in hysterics he’s bouncing up and down on his seat desperately trying to not crap himself, he keeps getting up and pleading with the driver, the driver keeps telling him only 15 more minutes. At this point my stomach is feeling weird again but nothing to the extreme it was before. My friend is up there next to the driver and this woman is telling him to breathe in and out and try to relax . Now this might be good advice but in a situation where you are about to shit yourself this is the worst possible advice ever. We finally come to a stop and my friend and I bolt out the bus and find the toilet. We are in adjacent cubicles. He texts me saying ‘ bro I shit myself on the bus after that women told me to breath in and out’ I have never laughed harder in my life, he continued to say he’s going to leave his boxers there and go commando. We finish up in the bathroom and continue to our destination relatively okay. This is an experience I will never forget due to the absolute ridicoulesness of the situation. It was a really shitty situation. (Pardon the pun).
